title: HOUR 3 - Chicago Bears, Isaiah Stanback, Rick Bucher
itunes:title: HOUR 3 - Chicago Bears, Isaiah Stanback, Rick Bucher
description:
In Hour 3, Colin gives his take on why the Chicago Bears must make a pivot. Isaiah Stanback joins to talk about the expectations of being a Rookie WR coming into the league. Rick Bucher joins to talk about the New York Knicks hinting at a Donovan Mitchell acquire and Boston being a perfect landing spot for a potential Kevin Durant.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
